text: I am excited for the weekend
I am grateful for my family
I am in a good mood
I am content with my day
I am hopeful about the future
I am excited to start my new job
I am having a bad day
I am upset about the situation
I am irritated by the delay
I am mad about the situation
I am not in the mood
I am irritated with the noise
I am frustrated with my work
I am fed up with everything
